articles.author: Dan Mangan
articles.title: Elon Musk $1 million voter lottery suit sent back to state court - CNBC
articles.description: Tesla CEO Elon Musk and his America PAC have backed Donald Trump in the presidential election against Kamala Harris.
articles.content:
A Pennsylvania federal judge on Friday returned to state court a lawsuit against billionaire Elon Musk and his political action committee for their $1 million daily giveaway to registered voters.

articles.title: Daylight saving: New push to 'goodnight' twice-a-year time change - TODAY
articles.description: As Americans prepare to fall back into standard time, the long-standing question on whether we should still be changing the clocks persists. Now, there's a growing push by state and federal lawmakers to end the twice-a-year time change. NBC’s Emilie Ikeda rep…
